name: Livent Corporation
description: Livent Corporation is a leading global producer of lithium hydroxide and lithium carbonate, essential components for electric vehicle (EV) batteries and energy storage systems. Founded in 2018, Livent emerged from the spin-off of FMC Corporation's lithium business, leveraging decades of expertise in lithium production. The company operates in the heart of the lithium supply chain, with production facilities in the United States and Argentina, and is committed to sustainable practices throughout its operations. Livent supplies lithium compounds to various industries, including automotive, aerospace, and consumer electronics, contributing to the growing demand for cleaner energy solutions and advanced battery technologies. As the world shifts towards electrification and renewable energy, Livent is strategically positioned to support this transition, investing in innovation and expanding its production capacity to meet the increasing needs of the EV market. The company's mission is to provide high-quality lithium products while maintaining a focus on environmental stewardship and corporate responsibility.
